docs.lead_paragraph: The bride is a student of nutrition and health; the groom is a retail marketing manager.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Berra’s institution in Little Falls on the Montclair State University campus is also a learning center that places increasing emphasis on teaching life lessons to children.

headline.main: Yogi Berra’s Values Shape Museum’s Mission

docs.abstract: Former New York Yankees veteran Yogi Berra attends ceremony at Yogi Berra Museum & Learning Center on campus of Montclair State University to celebrate his 90th birthday and open exhibition Saving Face: The Evolution of the Catcher & Goalie Mask (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
docs.snippet: Mr. Berra’s institution in Little Falls on the Montclair State University campus is also a learning center that places increasing emphasis on teaching life lessons to children.

docs.lead_paragraph: The accused in the FIFA scandal are easy to spot: globe-trotting executives charged with diverting millions meant to build the game to their personal accounts. Those who feel victimized aren't as obvious: Youth players with hand-me-down equipment, semi-pro clubs that can't afford to travel and developmental leagues that can't pay referees.

headline.main: Small Clubs, Youth Teams Feel Victimized by FIFA Scandal
headline.print_headline: Small Clubs, Youth Teams Feel Victimized by FIFA Scandal

docs.lead_paragraph: The worst day of Aaron Baker's life wasn't when the then-20-year-old professional motocross racer crashed his bike one spring day in 1999, flew over the handlebars and hit the ground head-first, paralyzing him from the neck down.

headline.main: Former Quadriplegic Runs, Walks to Show Others They Can
